title: Before taric is reworked
body: can we take a moment and appreciate that his been one of the strongest solo q champions forever due to his extremely simply but stat filled kit? like he is the amumu of support. (ps if u never played taric top lane or full ap mid try it today you wont get chance tomorrow)

replies.body:
His truly outrageous joke? Yeah, there's two of them.

One in reference to it, and one that's a blatant copy of it. It's truly buetiful.

You just queue top/jungle, and hope for last pick. Then, when you see 5 ADCs(isn't this meta just the BEST? /s) you can pick Taric, use that full armor rune page that you have, and completely stomp them.

Due to my great luck, the only time the enemy picks 3+ AP people is when I pick Taric


Truly outrageous
Is the rework tomorrow or something?
No, but the kit is likely to hit the PBE tomorrow, since they often soon follow any teasers.

I'm not sure about the "forever" bit. He was a strong top laner when you could build mana/armor tank for his passive, that was when I played him. And he was a permaban in what I remember to be elo hell (900-s when elo was still a number) but he seemed to have fallen out of popularity lately. Only seen 3 in the past 4 months, one which I was playing myself lol. He might be strong but I think blitz and thresh seem to be overshadowing him in the support role (based on frequency of appearances anyway)
Most people never did this, but I tended to max E on him. 320 base damage burst at level 5? Awww yiss :3
